name: Erik R. Forseth
body:
## About

I'm a sixth-year graduate student in the Department of Physics and Astronomy at UNC-Chapel Hill. I work with Dr. Charles Evans on approximations in Einstein's general theory of relativity, particularly the interface of the gravitational self-force (GSF) and post-Newtonian (PN) formalisms. 

My publications can be found [here](http://arxiv.org/find/gr-qc/1/au:+Forseth_E/0/1/0/all/0/1).
